dsOverview.title: China Monthly Station Precipitation and Temperature, 1951-1984, for 50 stns

summary.p: This dataset contains monthly temperature and precipitation data for Chinese stations for 1951 to 1984.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UCAR/NCAR/CGD/CAS > Climate Analysis Section, Climate and Global Dynamics Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount
